channel.title: Concurrency Elixir Otp on (Insightful) Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Concurrency Elixir Otp on (Insightful) Ramblings

item.title: Game of Life in Elixir and OTP
item.description: I’m back! During my time away from the blog, I’ve been working hard and (half-)taking various Coursera and EdX courses. The latest one is the inspiration for this blog post. The course wants me to use Scala and Kompics (course facilitators’ distributed framework thing). I really don’t have an interest in Scala, and I’m auditing the course so I can’t submit work anyway. I thought it’d be interesting to use Elixir and OTP to solve the problems.
